definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: Objective To learn the situation of supervision and management of pulmonary tuberculosis(TB) patients by village doctors and its influential factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解村醫生督導管理肺結核病人現狀及影響因素。

sentences.english: Monitor each club's performance with respect to service projects.
sentences.chinese: 督導各社在服務計劃方面之績效。

sentences.english: You’re a scholar and a supervisor.
The three dimensional teaching was highly evaluated by undergraduates and the supervising commission of teaching experts.
sentences.chinese: 教學效果受到學生和教學督導組專家的高度評價。

sentences.english: Supervisory issues and supervisory strategies may affect supervisee 's session impact.
sentences.chinese: 督導議題與督導策略可能影響受督者之晤談感受。

sentences.english: Supervisory issues and supervisory strategies may affect supervisee 's session impact.

sentences.english: I supervised three other girls and also took care of the company's correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 我督導其他三位女職員，我還負責處理公司的函件。

sentences.english: In China, the supervisor always tells the workers what to do.
sentences.chinese: 中國的督導總是告訴職工如何辦事的。

sentences.english: Jiang Xiaoli, Head of the Party Committee Steering Group of the district SASAC, attended and addressed the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 區國資委黨委督導組組長江小麗出席會議並講話。

sentences.english: In prison there are sadistic wardens.
sentences.chinese: 在監獄有虐待狂督導員。

sentences.english: Other trading irregularities as determined by resolution of the Surveillance Operations Oversight Committee.
sentences.chinese: 其他交易情形異常經監視業務督導會報決議者。

sentences.english: All rudders cause drag, both when steering the boat and in the "neutral" position.
sentences.chinese: 所有舵造成拖累，既當督導船並在“中立”立場。

sentences.english: US marshal Tony Bennet is overseeing security for the trial.
sentences.chinese: 美國聯邦保安官湯尼班尼特正在督導這試驗的安全性。

sentences.english: The school inspection in Britain pays much attention to moral and comity.
sentences.chinese: 同時，英國學校督導團也十分注重督導的道德和禮儀。

sentences.english: These same reports may be used to report to management and steering committees.
sentences.chinese: 這些報告可能也會用來向管理與督導委員會作彙報。
